channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Substandard reinstatement of footway carried out by National Grid contractors approx. 2 weeks ago. Paving slabs have been laid without any bedding or joints. The fines beneath have washed away allowing them to rock, become uneven with upstands creating trip hazards. This also results in water jets through the joints when stood on. It's clear a danger to all pedestrian traffic but especially to those with poor mobility or partial sight. Glos Hways. Network Management will be able to trace the works from recent records and ensure National Grid contractors return urgently to reinstate correctly before an accident occurs; in this instance that may be best executed via a Section 81 Notice., 19th February
item.description:
Three locations as per the photographs. 1. Outside the "Victory Club" Burlington House. GL50 2SY 2&3. Each side of the entrance to "Charles Russell Speechlys LLP" Compass House. GL50 2QY

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lypiatt Road, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deep pothole on Ermin Street on approach to roundabout, 19th February
item.description:
There is a deep pothole on the approach to the roundabout. I believe this may even be the one that was 'repaired' a month or so ago. It is particularly dangerous on the approach to the roundabout
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ermin Street, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple potholes in road by mini roundabouts, 19th February
item.description:
There are multiple potholes in the road on the mini roundabouts by the Holy Trinity Church. If travelling from Old Cheltenham Road to Church Lane it is VERY difficult to avoid hitting these as they are getting worse by the day!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Church Road, Longlevens, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Exploded Pot Hole, 19th February
item.description:
The Pothole here appears to have been hit hard this afternoon and there are chunks of debris around the pothole, could cause further damage to vehicles.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): B4070, Coberley, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flooded park footpath, 19th February
item.description:
The path across the park is readily flooded, underwater and muddy.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 309, Prestbury Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked drain preventing surface water draining, 19th February
item.description:
Blocked drain on service road which is public highway. The road is located between the block containing numbers 14 -19 & 20 -31 Bush Court

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 203, Priors Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flooded, 19th February
item.description:
Still flooded, cars driving in the middle of the road to avoid drowning, risks a dangerous head on collision on a 50mph road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Old Gloucester Road, Tewkesbury
